property.name: query
property.value: select hi.instance_id from hotspot_instance hi inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on hi.label = ds.disease and ds.disease_id = @export.label@ where hi.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and hi.experiment = 'ontocuis' order by hi.instance_id

property.name: query
property.value: select distinct hi.instance_id, c.code from hotspot_instance hi inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on hi.label = ds.disease and ds.disease_id = @export.label@ inner join hotspot_sentence hs on hi.hotspot_instance_id = hs.hotspot_instance_id and hs.evaluation >= @export.cutoff@ inner join anno_contain ac on ac.parent_anno_base_id = hs.anno_base_id inner join anno_ontology_concept c on c.anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id where hi.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and hi.experiment = 'ontocuis' order by hi.instance_id

property.name: query
property.value: select distinct hi.instance_id, w.canonical_form from hotspot_instance hi inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on hi.label = ds.disease and ds.disease_id = @export.label@ inner join hotspot_sentence hs on hi.hotspot_instance_id = hs.hotspot_instance_id and hs.evaluation >= @export.cutoff@ inner join anno_contain ac on ac.parent_anno_base_id = hs.anno_base_id inner join anno_word_token w on w.anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id and w.canonical_form is not null /* exclude words are not in named entities */ left join anno_contain acw on acw.child_anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id and acw.parent_uima_type_id = 8 where hi.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and hi.experiment = 'ontocuis' order by hi.instance_id
